StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetWaiverOccasions]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@WaiverOccasionType char(1) = 'E' AS
SELECT WO.WAIVER_OCCASION_ID, WO.WAIVER_OCCASION_DESC, CASE WO.WAIVER_OCCASION_DESC WHEN 'NWA' THEN 1 WHEN 'CONTRACT' THEN 2 WHEN 'OCS/SHIPPER' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END AS SORT_COLUMN FROM WAIVER_OCCASION WO WHERE WO.WAIVER_OCCASION_TYPE IN ('B', @WaiverOccasionType) ORDER BY SORT_COLUMN
